      • updateByID

        public <T> void updateByID(int id,
                           T dataObject)
        Updates a record by ID. The non-null fields of the updateObject are replaced to the fields on current record

      • update

        public <T> void update(T queryObject,
                       T updateObject)
        Finds all records matching the updateObject and updates the values from the updateObject's non-null fields

      • delete

        public <T> void delete(T object)
        Deletes a record. Mimics the session's delete method.

      • deleteMany

        public <T> void deleteMany(T queryObject)
        USE WITH CAUTION! Deletes all records matching object. If an empty object passed, may erase the entire collection.
